Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to enhance your daily productivity and efficiency. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $150 to you. Considering its high quality and potential impact on your work or lifestyle, I propose a special introductory price of $200 for you today. This is an exclusive opportunity to experience the product at a slightly elevated yet reasonable cost compared to its market value. I trust it will exceed your expectations and provide substantial value. Let me know if you're interested in taking advantage of this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
